• Deep experience in camera systems, computational photography, or imaging R&D.
• Hands-on experience with camera hardware (sensors, optics, lens modeling, and structured light technologies).
• Experience with Google Pixel, Apple iPhone, or similar high-end imaging pipelines.
• Strong expertise in image processing, sensor fusion, and perception algorithms.
• Proficiency in C++, Python, OpenCV, TensorFlow, PyTorch, and embedded vision frameworks.
• Knowledge of autonomous vehicle perception, robotics vision, or depth sensing.
• Familiarity with AI-powered image processing and neural rendering techniques.
